downloadTitle: System Center Management Pack for Guarded Fabric 2016 and above
downloadDescription: The Windows Server 2016 and above Guarded Fabric Management Pack enables discovery and monitoring of guarded hosts and Host Guardian Service instances in your environment with System Center Operations Manager.

downloadFile.name: Microsoft SCMP for Server Guarded Fabric 2016 and above.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/d/2/3/d23454ee-1b51-4ce6-a1eb-7dbcc8f15773/Microsoft SCMP for Server Guarded Fabric 2016 and above.msi

detailsSection: The Windows Server 2016 and above Guarded Fabric Management Pack enables discovery and monitoring of guarded hosts and Host Guardian Service instances in your environment with System Center Operations Manager. The alerts surfaced by this management pack will help you quickly detect and remediate service availability issues with the Host Guardian Service and Hyper-V host misconfigurations that could prevent you from succesfully starting up shielded VMs.
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft SCMP for Server Guarded Fabric 2016 and above.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows Server 2016
WIndows Server 2019
Windows Server 2022
System Center 2016 - Operations Manager
System Center 2019 - Operations Manager
System Center 2022 - Operations Manager
installInstructionSection:
1. Download and install System Center 2016 or above version - Operations Manager and all available updates
  2. Download and install the Windows Server 2016 and above Guarded Fabric Management Pack
  3. Follow the configuration recommendations located in the guarded fabric MP guide
